metadata.title: CVE-2020-20448 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: FFmpeg 4.1.3 is affected by a Divide By Zero issue via libavcodec/ratecontrol.c, which allows a remote malicious user to cause a Denial of Service.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3').
